transformations.name: DriftYellowTaxi
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: DriftGreenTaxi
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'nyctaxi',
	folderPath: 'nyctaxi-curated-df/transactions/yellow-taxi') ~> YellowTaxi
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'nyctaxi',
	folderPath: 'nyctaxi-curated-df/transactions/green-taxi') ~> GreenTaxi
YellowTaxi derive(vendor_id = toString(byName('vendor_id')),
		pickup_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('pickup_datetime')),
		dropoff_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('dropoff_datetime')),
		store_and_fwd_flag = toString(byName('store_and_fwd_flag')),
		rate_code_id = toDouble(byName('rate_code_id')),
		pickup_location_id = toInteger(byName('pickup_location_id')),
		dropoff_location_id = toInteger(byName('dropoff_location_id')),
		pickup_longitude = toDouble(byName('pickup_longitude')),
		pickup_latitude = toDouble(byName('pickup_latitude')),
		dropoff_longitude = toDouble(byName('dropoff_longitude')),
		dropoff_latitude = toDouble(byName('dropoff_latitude')),
		passenger_count = toDouble(byName('passenger_count')),
		trip_distance = toDouble(byName('trip_distance')),
		fare_amount = toDouble(byName('fare_amount')),
		extra = toDouble(byName('extra')),
		mta_tax = toDouble(byName('mta_tax')),
		tip_amount = toDouble(byName('tip_amount')),
		tolls_amount = toDouble(byName('tolls_amount')),
		ehail_fee = toInteger(byName('ehal_fee')),
		improvement_surcharge = toDouble(byName('improvement_surcharge')),
		total_amount = toDouble(byName('total_amount')),
		payment_type = toString(byName('payment_type')),
		trip_type = toDouble(byName('trip_type')),
		congestion_surcharge = toDouble(byName('congestion_surcharge')),
		surcharge = toDouble(byName('surcharge')),
		airport_fee = toDouble(byName('airport_fee')),
		vendor_abbreviation = toString(byName('vendor_abbreviation')),
		vendor_description = toString(byName('vendor_description')),
		trip_type_description = toString(byName('trip_type_description')),
		month_name_short = toString(byName('month_name_short')),
		month_name_full = toString(byName('month_name_full')),
		payment_type_description = toString(byName('payment_type_description')),
		rate_code_description = toString(byName('rate_code_description')),
		pickup_borough = toString(byName('pickup_borough')),
		pickup_zone = toString(byName('pickup_zone')),
		pickup_service_zone = toString(byName('pickup_service_zone')),
		dropoff_borough = toString(byName('dropoff_borough')),
		dropoff_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_zone')),
		dropoff_service_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_service_zone')),
		pickup_year = toInteger(byName('pickup_year')),
		pickup_month = toInteger(byName('pickup_month')),
		pickup_day = toInteger(byName('pickup_day')),
		pickup_hour = toInteger(byName('pickup_hour')),
		pickup_minute = toInteger(byName('pickup_minute')),
		pickup_second = toInteger(byName('pickup_second')),
		pickup_date = toDate(byName('pickup_date')),
		dropoff_year = toInteger(byName('dropoff_year')),
		dropoff_month = toInteger(byName('dropoff_month')),
		dropoff_day = toInteger(byName('dropoff_day')),
		dropoff_hour = toInteger(byName('dropoff_hour')),
		dropoff_minute = toInteger(byName('dropoff_minute')),
		dropoff_second = toInteger(byName('dropoff_second')),
		dropoff_date = toDate(byName('dropoff_date')),
		trip_year = toInteger(byName('trip_year')),
		trip_month = toInteger(byName('trip_month')),
		taxi_type = toString(byName('taxi_type')),
		dataset_file_nm = toString(byName('dataset_file_nm'))) ~> DriftYellowTaxi
GreenTaxi derive(taxi_type = toString(byName('taxi_type')),
		vendor_id = toString(byName('vendor_id')),
		pickup_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('pickup_datetime')),
		dropoff_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('dropoff_datetime')),
		store_and_fwd_flag = toString(byName('store_and_fwd_flag')),
		rate_code_id = toInteger(byName('rate_code_id')),
		pickup_location_id = toInteger(byName('pickup_location_id')),
		dropoff_location_id = toInteger(byName('dropoff_location_id')),
		passenger_count = toDouble(byName('passenger_count')),
		trip_distance = toDouble(byName('trip_distance')),
		fare_amount = toDouble(byName('fare_amount')),
		extra = toDouble(byName('extra')),
		mta_tax = toDouble(byName('mta_tax')),
		tip_amount = toDouble(byName('tip_amount')),
		tolls_amount = toDouble(byName('tolls_amount')),
		ehail_fee = toInteger(byName('ehail_fee')),
		improvement_surcharge = toDouble(byName('improvement_surcharge')),
		total_amount = toDouble(byName('total_amount')),
		payment_type = toString(byName('payment_type')),
		trip_type = toDouble(byName('trip_type')),
		vendor_abbreviation = toString(byName('vendor_abbreviation')),
		vendor_description = toString(byName('vendor_description')),
		trip_type_description = toString(byName('trip_type_description')),
		month_name_short = toString(byName('month_name_short')),
		month_name_full = toString(byName('month_name_full')),
		payment_type_description = toString(byName('payment_type_description')),
		rate_code_description = toString(byName('rate_code_description')),
		pickup_borough = toString(byName('pickup_borough')),
		pickup_zone = toString(byName('pickup_zone')),
		pickup_service_zone = toString(byName('pickup_service_zone')),
		dropoff_borough = toString(byName('dropoff_borough')),
		dropoff_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_zone')),
		dropoff_service_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_service_zone')),
		pickup_year = toInteger(byName('pickup_year')),
		pickup_month = toInteger(byName('pickup_month')),
		pickup_day = toInteger(byName('pickup_day')),
		pickup_hour = toInteger(byName('pickup_hour')),
		pickup_minute = toInteger(byName('pickup_minute')),
		pickup_second = toInteger(byName('pickup_second')),
		dropoff_year = toInteger(byName('dropoff_year')),
		dropoff_month = toInteger(byName('dropoff_month')),
		dropoff_day = toInteger(byName('dropoff_day')),
		dropoff_hour = toInteger(byName('dropoff_hour')),
		dropoff_minute = toInteger(byName('dropoff_minute')),
		dropoff_second = toInteger(byName('dropoff_second')),
		dataset_file_nm = toString(byName('dataset_file_nm')),
		trip_year = toInteger(byName('trip_year')),
		trip_month = toInteger(byName('trip_month')),
		congestion_surcharge = toDouble(byName('congestion_surcharge'))) ~> DriftGreenTaxi
DerivedGreenTaxi select(mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		congestion_surcharge,
		surcharge,
		airport_fee,
		vendor_abbreviation,
		vendor_description,
		trip_type_description,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		payment_type_description,
		rate_code_description,
		pickup_borough,
		pickup_zone,
		pickup_service_zone,
		dropoff_borough,
		dropoff_zone,
		dropoff_service_zone,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		pickup_date,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		dropoff_date,
		trip_year,
		trip_month,
		taxi_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinalColumnsGreen
DriftYellowTaxi select(mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		congestion_surcharge,
		surcharge,
		airport_fee,
		vendor_abbreviation,
		vendor_description,
		trip_type_description,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		payment_type_description,
		rate_code_description,
		pickup_borough,
		pickup_zone,
		pickup_service_zone,
		dropoff_borough,
		dropoff_zone,
		dropoff_service_zone,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		pickup_date,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		dropoff_date,
		trip_year,
		trip_month,
		taxi_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinalColumnsYellow
FinalColumnsYellow, FinalColumnsGreen union(byName: true)~> UnionYellowGreen
DriftGreenTaxi derive(pickup_longitude = toDouble('0'),
		pickup_latitude = toDouble('0'),
		dropoff_longitude = toDouble('0'),
		dropoff_latitude = toDouble('0'),
		airport_fee = toDouble('0'),
		surcharge = toDouble('0'),
		pickup_date = toDate(pickup_datetime),
		dropoff_date = toDate(dropoff_datetime)) ~> DerivedGreenTaxi
UnionYellowGreen sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'nyctaxi',
	folderPath: 'nyctaxi-consumption-df/transactions/materialized-view',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		taxi_type,
		trip_year,
		trip_month
	)) ~> SinkToConsumption
